body.name: Amazon Basics 3-Blade Disposable Razors for Men, 6 Count (2 Packs of 3), Black (Previously Solimo)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 mins
features: Includes 2 packs of 3 Amazon Basics 3-Blade Disposable Razors for Men
Packaging may vary from images shown. This was previously a Solimo product and is now a part of the Amazon Basics brand. The product is the exact same formulation, size and quality.
Convenience: great for travel, grab and go
Double coated blade edge for a close, comfortable shave
Anti-clog cartridge to quickly rinse clean
Hypoallergenic lubricating strips, with Vitamin E, to help reduce skin irritation
Care instructions: After use, store razors with the blades facing up (away from water) in order to allow the lube strip to dry
Alexa voice shopping enabled: to place your next order, just say, “Alexa, reorder Amazon Basics Disposable Razor”
If you like Gillette Mach3 Disposable Razors, we invite you to try Amazon Basics 3-Blade Disposable Razors for Men
body.description: The Amazon Basics 3-Blade Disposable Razor for Men features dual lubrication and double coated blade edge for a close, comfortable shave. The razor cartridge is hypoallergenic, includes a lubricating strip with vitamin E, and has an anti-clog design for quick rinse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Razors for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Used to get the slim twins but they stopped making them. Decided to try these and was pleasantly surprised. One of the best quality disposables I’ve seen. I’ve only shaved once but the shave was like a non disposable razor. I’m going to feel guilty throwing them away. Hopefully they last a few shaves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent Mid-Grade Razors
reviews.reviewText: First Impressions:These razors are comfortable when you first use them. They look ok, and feel good in the hand. The packaging is fine and the blades have a protective cover attached.Positives:The razor actually feels very smooth at first. The price is better than most mid-grade brands at the local store. They rinse out easily without clogging up.Negatives:The shave isn't very close. It seems that they traded comfort for effectiveness. Yes, they shave stubble from daily to 3-days of growth. But feeling the skin after a shave reveals that they don't cut very close. After about 2 weeks, they get dull and rough, which significantly decreases the shaving comfort. I can usually get 2-3 times that life out of the Schick Extreme3, which also delivers a closer shave. (It's far superior to the Bic disposable razors.)Summary:Mid-grade razors that work ok, but have short lifespan and basic design aesthetics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Razor Glides Right Over Stuble<>Not in a good way
reviews.reviewText: Seriously 1 of the worst razors I ever used, & I've been shaving 45+ yrs. Looks good feels good but it takes 3 4 even 5 times over to get a clean shave. It's like it glides too high over actual hair. First use might only have to re-do some spots 2 or 3 times, at different angles. After 3 or 4 uses be prepared to spend extra 5 minutes for finding missed spots. Looks good in mirror but upon rinsing I feel 2 3 4 5 areas that need re-doing. Amazon got rid of the good orange bics that were 40% cheaper & waayyy better quality. Tossing these out, not even worth using once or twice.
